meanings.definition: A unit of time equal to one thousandth of a second.
meanings.sent1: She finished the race in a millisecond.
meanings.sent2: I'll be there in a millisecond, just wait for me.
meanings.sent3: He blinked, and in a millisecond, the cake disappeared.
meanings.sent4: The decision had to be made in a millisecond, like a lightning strike.
meanings.sent5: The car sped by in a millisecond, leaving only a blur behind.

meanings.definition: A very short period of time.
meanings.sent1: The meeting lasted only a millisecond.
meanings.sent2: It will only take a millisecond to grab a snack.
meanings.sent3: In the blink of a millisecond, the cat pounced on the toy.
meanings.sent4: The excitement of the crowd filled the room for a millisecond.
meanings.sent5: The sun peeked out for a millisecond before disappearing behind the clouds again.
